name: @cucinalist/dsl
description: Domain-specific language (DSL) grammar, parser and walker for Cucinalist

scripts.generate-ts-parser: antlr -Xexact-output-dir src/cucinalistLexer.g4 -Dlanguage=TypeScript -o src/__generated__ && antlr -Xexact-output-dir src/cucinalistParser.g4 -Dlanguage=TypeScript -o src/__generated__ -lib src/__generated__
scripts.generate-java-parser: antlr -Xexact-output-dir src/cucinalistLexer.g4 -o src/__generated__ && antlr -Xexact-output-dir src/cucinalistParser.g4 -o src/__generated__ -lib src/__generated__ && javac src/__generated__/*.java

author: Paolo F. Bongiovanni <paolo.bongiovanni@mindiply.com>
